reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 255/23: PRESCRIBED AREAS - SECTION 114 OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: PRESCRIBED AREAS — SECTION 114 OF THE ACT
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 255/23: PRESCRIBED AREAS - SECTION 114 OF THE ACT

content.content:
1. (1) The following areas are prescribed for the purposes of subsection 114 (1.2) of the Act: 1.  Any area that is within 300 metres of a railway line other than a railway line set out in subsection (2). 2.  Any area that is within 120 metres of, i.  a wetland, ii.  the shoreline of the Great Lakes-St. Lawrence River System, iii.  an inland lake, or iv.  a river or stream valley that has depressional features associated with a river or stream, whether or not it contains a watercourse. (2) For the purposes of paragraph 1 of subsection (1), a railway line excludes, (a)  a railway line to which the Canada Transportation Act (Canada) applies and whose operations have been discontinued under section 146 of that Act; (b)  an abandoned railway line to which the
Canada Transportation Act (Canada) does not apply; and (c)  a railway line on which the only railway that operates is an urban rail transit system. (3) Subsection (1) does not apply in respect of any development for which a building permit has been issued on or before August 9, 2023.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The following areas are prescribed for the purposes of subsection 114 (1.2) of the Act:

1.  Any area that is within 300 metres of a railway line other than a railway line set out in subsection (2).

2.  Any area that is within 120 metres of,

i.  a wetland,

ii.  the shoreline of the Great Lakes-St. Lawrence River System,

iii.  an inland lake, or

iv.  a river or stream valley that has depressional features associated with a river or stream, whether or not it contains a watercourse.

(2) For the purposes of paragraph 1 of subsection (1), a railway line excludes,

(a)  a railway line to which the Canada Transportation Act (Canada) applies and whose operations have been discontinued under section 146 of that Act;

(b)  an abandoned railway line to which the Canada Transportation Act (Canada) does not apply; and

(c)  a railway line on which the only railway that operates is an urban rail transit system.

(3) Subsection (1) does not apply in respect of any development for which a building permit has been issued on or before August 9, 2023.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
